definitions.definition: A small community, often rural, whose members share in the ownership of property, and in the division of labour; the members of such a community.
A local political division in many European countries.
Communion; sympathetic intercourse or conversation between friends
To converse together with sympathy and confidence; to interchange sentiments or feelings; to take counsel.
(followed by with) To communicate (with) spiritually; to be together (with); to contemplate or absorb.
definitions.example: He spent a week in the backcountry, communing with nature.
